long_description: The stretchy, quick-drying prAna Marla Tank Top is ready for your next yoga session. An internal shelf bra offers light support, and the open-backed design keeps you cool-and stylish. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying polyester and spandex blend feels soft to the touch and has 4-way stretch to move with you through the toughest poses. The prAna Marla Tank Top features an internal shelf bra that offers light support; slim molded cups offer coverage and can be removed to personalize the fit. Close-to-skin, fitted styling; contoured seaming. Closeout.
short_description: The stretchy, quick-drying prAna Marla Tank Top is ready for your next yoga session. An internal shelf bra offers light support, and the open-backed design keeps you cool-and stylish.
